casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald V. RUCKER. No. 478P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Philip E. Berger, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Discretionary Review by the Supreme Court:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
